name: Missing Parts (f1van, Nukeland, Optifun, Bobby16)
description:
Puzzle game about connecting blocks in different ways to get the right shape

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Click on the block - Activate the ability of a special block

R - Reload level

TEAM:

Ivan Frolov - Programmer, Game Designer, Level Designer

Dmitry Frolov - Software Engineer, Programmer

Mariya Tarasova - Artist, Game Designer

Valery Tarasov - Artist

Special thanks to Liliya Lipina for translating the game.
